column4: Oh I'm confused webnet. If you look at my first pastie.org, the home says 82 G I think and then when you look in the two profiles, it adds up to much less
especially in /home, there might be (large?) files in hidden directories (starting with a dot, like .VirtualBox)
not in  du -sk *   but try   du -sk .*
ah well, many pastebins can be used

another guy who helped earlier asked me to use pastie.org so that's why... Ok I might drop off.. I realized that weechat seems to be mounted on the partition I am trying to salvage. I will umount the partition. If I drop, you will know why! (running on a live USB)
I guess there is no way to find out what's in this .encryptfs unless I find my passphrase eh?
I lost my libre office and a whole bunch of things in my application menu. I would like to add them back in there but when I do whereis libreoffice, it's not that
what does  dpkg -l libreoffice-common  say? Is it still installed?
but what are the first characters on that line?
rc  libreoffice-common                1:3.3.4-0ubuntu1                  office productivity suite -- arch-independent files
I don't know what happened, but the "rc" at the beginning of the line says "removed but config files remain"
